Uses of Class
com.precog.client.AccountInfo

  • Packages that use AccountInfo 
    Package Description
    com.precog.client
    Contains PrecogClient, simple Java client for working with Precog.

    • Uses of AccountInfo in com.precog.client

      Methods in com.precog.client that return AccountInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AccountInfo PrecogClient.createAccount(String email, String password)
      Creates a new account ID, accessible by the specified email address and password, or returns the existing account ID.
      static AccountInfo PrecogClient.createAccount(URL service, String email, String password)
      Creates a new account ID, accessible by the specified email address and password, or returns the existing account ID.
      static AccountInfo PrecogClient.describeAccount(String email, String password, String accountId)
      Retrieves the details about a particular account.
      static AccountInfo PrecogClient.describeAccount(URL service, String email, String password, String accountId)
      Retrieves the details about a particular account.
      Constructors in com.precog.client with parameters of type AccountInfo 
      Constructor and Description
      PrecogClient(AccountInfo account)
      Construct a new PrecogClient using the API key of the given account, the account ID of the account as the data owner, and the account root path as the base path.
      PrecogClient(URL service, AccountInfo account)
      Construct a new PrecogClient using the API key of the given account, the account ID of the account as the data owner, and the account root path as the base path.
